Package cdx.opencdx.commons.data

Interface OpenCDXRepository<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the entity.
All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<T,OpenCDXIdentifier>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<T,OpenCDXIdentifier>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<T,OpenCDXIdentifier>, org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<T,OpenCDXIdentifier>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<T,OpenCDXIdentifier>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<T>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<T,OpenCDXIdentifier>
All Known Subinterfaces:
OpenCDXAllergyRepository, OpenCDXAuditEventRepository, OpenCDXBPMRepository, OpenCDXClassificationRepository, OpenCDXConnectedLabRepository, OpenCDXConnectedTestRepository, OpenCDXCountryRepository, OpenCDXDeviceRepository, OpenCDXEmailTemplateRepository, OpenCDXHeartRPMRepository, OpenCDXHeightMeasurementRepository, OpenCDXIAMOrganizationRepository, OpenCDXIAMProviderRepository, OpenCDXIAMUserRepository, OpenCDXIAMWorkspaceRepository, OpenCDXManufacturerRepository, OpenCDXMediaRepository, OpenCDXMedicationAdministrationRepository, OpenCDXMedicationRepository, OpenCDXMessageRepository, OpenCDXMessageTemplateRepository, OpenCDXNotificaitonRepository, OpenCDXNotificationEventRepository, OpenCDXOrderRepository, OpenCDXProfileRepository, OpenCDXQuestionnaireRepository, OpenCDXShippingRepository, OpenCDXSMSTemplateRespository, OpenCDXTestCaseRepository, OpenCDXUserQuestionnaireRepository, OpenCDXVaccineRepository, OpenCDXVendorRepository, OpenCDXWeightMeasurementRepository
@NoRepositoryBean public interface OpenCDXRepository<T> extends org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<T,OpenCDXIdentifier>
OpenCDXRepository is a generic interface for MongoDB repositories that use OpenCDXIdentifier as the ID type.
